content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
---------- Forwarded message ----------
Date: Mon, 18 Aug 2014 17:53:48 +0200
From: David MENTRE <dmentre@linux-france.org>
Reply-To: coq-club@inria.fr
To: coq-club@inria.fr, why3-club@lists.gforge.inria.fr,
Frama-C public discussion <frama-c-discuss@lists.gforge.inria.fr>,
spark2014-discuss@lists.forge.open-do.org, bforum@listes.ifsttar.fr
Subject: [Coq-Club] Open position on formal methods at Mitsubishi Electric R&D
Centre Europe

Hello,

My research laboratory, Mitsubishi Electric R&D Centre Europen, opened a
permanent researcher position (French "CDI"). A significant part of the
research work is going to be on formal methods in an industrial context:

Opened position for an Advanced Software Research Engineer
http://www.fr.mitsubishielectric-rce.eu/xindex.php?id=85

This position is not strictly related to Coq, Frama-C, SPARK, Why3 or B tools
but we are looking for people having a strong background in such kind of tools
and theories behind them.

Feel free to forward this announcement to other relevant mailing lists
(Isabelle, Agda, ...): I don't know or follow all the communities.

If you have questions or remarks, you can ask them directly to me.

Sincerely yours,
D. Mentr√©
